name: metadata-remote
description: Metadata Remote is a self-hosted backend for fetching and serving TV and movie metadata for media servers. It supports integrations with Plex, Emby, or Jellyfin and allows local caching of metadata.
features: Metadata fetching: Retrieve TV show and movie information from online databases automatically.
Local caching: Store metadata locally to reduce external API calls and improve performance.
Media server integration: Connect with Plex, Emby, or Jellyfin to provide metadata services.
Poster and artwork: Download and serve cover art, posters, and background images for media.
Episode information: Fetch detailed episode data including titles, descriptions, and air dates.
Cast and crew data: Provide actor, director, and production information for media items.
Multiple sources: Aggregate metadata from various online databases for comprehensive coverage.
API compatibility: Implement standard metadata API protocols for seamless media server integration.
Update scheduling: Automatically refresh metadata on a schedule to keep information current.
Custom mappings: Override or supplement automatic metadata with manual corrections.
Bandwidth optimization: Reduce external API usage by serving cached metadata locally.
Privacy focused: Keep metadata requests within your network without exposing viewing habits.
